pageContent: 3 The SPHERE of BINAH Understanding The Supernal Mother or Great Womb The Organizer and Compensator The Will to Form The Dark Sterile Mother; the Bright Fertile Mother The Great Sea Symbols: The Yoni, the Triangle, the Cup, Heh Planet: Saturn Color: Black Of the Thirty-Two Paths of Wisdom the Third is know n as the Sanctifying Inte lligence. The Sphere of the Operation of Binah is that of Shabbathi, or rest, and it gives forms and similitudes unto chaotic matter and it rules the sphere of action of the pl anet Saturn. And Jehovah Elohim is the perfection of Creation and the Life of the World to Come. Its Archa ngel is Tzaphqiel, the Prince of the Spiritual Strife against Evil, and the name of the Angels is Aralim , the strong and mighty Ones who are also called the Order of Thrones.
